Happy Diwali, festival of lights, to family and all loved ones. Let us all overcome our fears, mistakes,  and doubts and move forward with our best potentials remembering good and leaving all bad things behind. Wishing all we know the best prosperity, success, health, love, understanding, happiness, gratitude, forgiveness, and all abundance in food, shelter, water, and all desires. Hope all your dreams may come true. Sending you all love and wishing for the most productive future ahead for all of us. We all have ability to transform to our highest alignment and true purpose and become what we think today. Let us transform together working for the purpose of all highest good in nature.

Marketing Communications Executive, Artisan Creative Director, Fundraising Coordinator, Member
Global Alliance for Peace and Sustainability

Present all ideas in Thinktask Force for Visual Communications. Coordinate all visual presentations through digital art, paintings to unify, collaborate, rejuvenate all projects involving improvement of education, reduction of poverty, increasing awareness of permaculture, reorganizing infrastructures to promote growth, stability, abundance, and expansion of all resources through fundraising as the main Artisan for GAPS.

Digital art, Visuals, Live Visual Mixing, Fractalizations from international artists sharing their work from the depths of their vast imagination mixing vivid colors and patterns to bring our souls alive into layered realities. This group showcases worldwide artists. Their work is credited to the artists themselves.   The page DigitalNova is Archrayz digital fractal visual patterns, but the group is for everyone to share their digital art. Thus the difference between the page and the group. If you have any questions - feel free to ask the artists about their work.

Cognitive Neuroscience Laboratory (Special Project) Real World Brain Computer Interface (BCI) Project                                                               Mar 2002 – Mar 2003                                    Conducted subjects over a series of biofeedback training sessions to control a particular brainwave related to motor activity. Recorded EEG data, analyzed and interpreted findings using Excel. Put together a proposal, and PowerPoint presentation representing our findings. Presented study and awarded at 16th annual Undergraduate Research Conference.

Archrayz is known for creating emotional and visually arresting paintings and jewelry and promoting other artists that are touched by the same relentless creative fire. Her passion for art, artists, and small businesses has inspired her to help starting artists create websites, learn how and where to sell their art, how to make contacts within the art community, and where to rent or borrow necessary materials to create their paintings and photographs.

February 6, 2011, Daniel was a client of Arch’s

I had the luck to get to know Archana by pure chance and was so fascinated by her art that I bought one of her wonderful paintings, which is a real enrichment for my home. Archana is not only an incredibly creative and talented artist, she also has great humour and personality, while always demonstrating a very professional attitude. I enjoyed making business with her, and if you are looking for highly expressive paintings or are in need of some of the other creative services she offers, I recommend to check out her work yourself.

Marcus Olivieri
Solution Director at Guidewire Software
January 9, 2011, Marcus worked with Arch but at different companies

I met Archana through a good friend within the creative art world and loved her artistic approach to anything she sets her mind to. Her creativity, resourcefulness and ability to see her projects of art through really make her distinctive and successful. From time to time I'm lucky to observe every step of her creative process, seeing different stages of her projects. She has a wonderful personality to go hand in hand with her creativity. Along with a wonderful sense of humor, she is a joy to be around. I am proud to have one of her pieces in my home and would recommend to anyone that is in need of such creativity and art to see her work first hand.

Forward-thinking and ambitious Marketing Manager looking for new opportunities.
June 25, 2016, Arch worked with Teija but at different companies

Teija is a dynamic, and inspiring leader who knows how to bring out the best in people. She has led multiple organizations through transformational change, always staying on the bleeding edge in support of the company’s goals and needs. Her style makes you feel completely comfortable even when in challenging situations. She is encouraging and supportive of her leaders while remaining determined to raise the bar on all she and her teams deliver. Her stellar reputation speaks volumes, she is an asset to any company.

summary: Captivating eyes through the movement of color, Archrayz visually communicates interpretative inspirations across the boundaries of cultural paradoxes. By interweaving expressions of life’s experiences, Archrayz displays a bold sense of poetically personal freedom breaking out of the confines of a restrictive social structure. Since 2010, Archrayz has become an artistic outlet providing a foundation to elevate any who wish to rise above the pressures of debilitating censorship and conformity.For commissioned works and art inquiries contact archrayz@icloud.com
